LongDescription:
Dark Neon is a SnowboardTV theme.

This will catch your eyes for sure! 

Great for parties, awesome for style.

No need to worry about neutral Apple icons
Dark Neon will have your Apple TV covered.

         Follow @Joshblah555

***ChangeLog***

Version 1.0-2

- Bug fix with an icon not appearing when highlighted

- Readded missing Arcade icon


Version 1.0

- Many more icons included

- More Top shelf icons added

- More icon fixes


Version 0.0.5

- New Top Shelf designs for AppStore apps

- Wallpapers to support both 4/4K

- Fixed older logos

- Added new icons

- Adjusted older icons


Version 0.0.2

- Added new AppStore icons

- Added nitoTV icons

- Included a new icon glow effect


Version 0.0.1

- Initial release

- Adjusted new icons
